channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly news - November 2023
item.description:
Microsoft Defender for Cloud Monthly news November 2023 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from October 2023.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcasts (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External content
Product improvements
Announcements
Microsoft Defender for Cloud
Microsoft Defender for Cloud now supports the latest CIS Azure Security Foundations Benchmark - version 2.0.0 in t...
